original_text: Jesus returned to the other side of the lake in the boat. While he was by the lake, a large crowd came to him.
korean_text: 예수께서 배를 타시고 다시 맞은편으로 건너가시니 큰 무리가 그에게로 모이거늘 이에 바닷가에 계시더니

sentences.original_text: Jesus returned to the other side
of the lake in the boat
While he was by the lake
a large crowd came to him
